name: Everybody stay calm!
description:
Description:
A comedy game about when all the deadlines are overdue, but still the project must be completed today. You play as a manager tasked with finishing a project and preventing the entire team from burning out in the workplace.

Game features:

  • Time management game with some fighting elements;
  • Cute little animals in suits;
  • Coworkers on fire;
  • Panic! Panic! Everyone is panicking! 

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or arrows 
  • Interact with E  

Made with by:

  • Yulia Schreider — Game design, In-game text
  • Darya Spiryova — 2d Artist
  • Alina Svintsova — Unity developer
  • Sergey Chichkan — Unity developer
  • Nikita Sukhodub — Unity developer

-------------

 Sounds: https://freesound.org/

 Music: Wallpaper Paste by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com       

-------------

Specially made for Ludum Dare 50 (theme: Delay the inevitable)
